name: Merry Christmas, B
description:
Made for the Gift Jam 2022. I found the jam on the main jam page on Itch.io and decided to make this game for my girlfriend. I've been wanting to make a game like this for a while, and decided to dedicate it to her. Merry Christmas. I did go over the 6-hour suggestion by an incredibly large margin, though.

Unfortunately, I missed the margin to submit by a couple of seconds while doing some last minute changes. Whoops!

https://itch.io/jam/gift-jam-2022
